dublin_core.dcvalue: The Health COMpass is an interactive and collaborative resource for high quality tools and project examples to build capacity in social and behavior change communication SBCC powered by the Health Communication Capacity Collaborative HC3 of Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health Center for Communication Programs JHU CCP The Health COMpass Focus Package on Information and Communication Technology ICT in SBCC includes an overview of ICT as well as helpful tools to learn more about ICT and specifically about ICT implementation within an SBCC framework Strong examples of ICT SBCC public health interventions in this package further highlight what ICT looks like on the ground
